Hey i got a problem and i'm not sure if its my pc or these last few rips. Anyone having trouble with the audio being out of sync? I just got this and Whip it and the video is like 1-2 seconds ahead of the audio.

I've noticed that when the movie first starts playing, there is an obvious jump/skip/lag during the logo for 21st Century. Invention of lying and Pandorum are fine.

Oops forgot to mention, i did try YAMB to recreate the audio with the 2ch and its exactly the same, right at the start of the movie, there is an obvious jump for Whip It. Audio is still 1-2 seconds out of sync. Same with Post Grad.
